resources.string: Please enter the PIN to unlock the accounts.
There are no deleted accounts in the database.
Database backed up to SD card.
Database could not be backed up to SD card.
Are you sure you wish to restore the database?
Database restored from SD card. Application will be stopped to reload the database.
Database could not be restored from the SD card.
Backing up the database. This may take a while.
Restoring the database. This may take a while.

You have upgraded to a new version of loot. If you encounter any bugs, please email me at christopher.mccurdy@gmail.com with what you were doing at the time. Also, please feel free to donate to me through PayPal. Would you like to donate now?
You can always donate at a later time by going to \"Settings\", choosing \"About\", and clicking on the donation button.

Loot requires that you have a valid locale set in order to work properly. Please set your locale in \"Settings -> Locale & text -> Set locale\" and try again, otherwise you may not be able to enter transaction amounts properly. If you\'ve set the locale and it still doesn\'t work, use loot\'s settings to override the values it should detect.
An error has occurred while repeating a transaction, and the transaction could not be found. The repeat schedule has been deleted.
Thank you for purchasing the loot premium package! :-D
You must purchase the loot premium package in order to access these settings.
• Importing and exporting CSV and Quicken files
• Ability to add receipts/images to transactions
• And more features planned for the future!
Please feel free to donate to support the continued development of free software. I would like to thank everyone who has donated so far for your support.
If you have any comments, questions, suggestions, or have discovered any bugs, please feel free to let me know at christopher.mccurdy@gmail.com.
Portions of loot may be using JavaCSV. JavaCSV is provided for free under the LGPL license. The source code and licensing details are available at http://sourceforge.net/projects/javacsv
Portions of loot may be using flot, which is provided for free under the MIT license. The source code and licensing details are available at http://code.google.com/p/flot/
External storage is not available. This operation will not function properly.
There is less than 1% total available memory on the external storage device. This operation may fail if it runs out of storage space.
Please set an account to the primary by long-clicking and choosing \'Toggle Primary Account\' or editing the account and choosing that option. Otherwise, you may want to turn the option off.
Choose the style of the on-screen keyboard.

Enter date format as expected (ex. yyyy-MM-dd); empty for default values:
 yyyy - 4 digit year
 yy - 2 digit year
 MM - 2 digit month
 MMM - Text month
 dd - 2 digit day

Enter the order for CSV columns (default: %d,%c,%p,%a,%t)
 %d - date
 %c - check number
 %p - party
 %a - amount
 %b - absolute amount (used with %y)
 %y - transaction type (credit/debit)
 %t - tags
 %z - unused column
Enter comma-separated values for debit transactions (default: debit, withdraw):
Enter comma-separated values for credit transactions (default: credit, deposit):
